alert.note: Alert for Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Madison, southeastern Cook, west central Lanier, Lowndes and Brooks Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 800 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles east of Pavo to 9 miles southeast of Boston. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Valdosta, Quitman, Hahira, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Dasher, Morven, Cecil, Grooverville, Barretts, Nankin, Empress, Clyattville, Brooks Co A/p, I-75 At Exit 11, Dixie, Naylor and Barney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
